Hi Ron,
I'm afraid I have been unable to recreate this in my workspace, but I have 
checked in a potential fix.  Do you think you could possibly try the latest 
development build to see if my fix does work?  If it doesn't would you mind 
trying to provide a bit more help on how to reproduce this?  Thanks very much.

Thanks Sian! I'm downloading today's dev build to get the fix. I couldn't 
figure out how to get AJDT into this state, but once it happened it happened 
for all the builds invoked thereafter. One thing: I had never seen this problem 
before recently, so it might be something that changed?

I'll let you know if I still see the problem, otherwise we can call it closed 
after a few days.
Assume fixed.  Thanks Ron - please re-open if you see the problem again.
